subprocess_flow.description: The inventory management system automatically collects data on all stock-out incidents, including product details, dates, times, quantities, root causes, and associated lost sales.
success_criteria: All stock-out incidents are automatically recorded

subprocess_flow.description: The inventory manager generates regular reports (e.g., monthly, quarterly) summarizing stock-out frequency by product category, lost sales due to stock-outs, time to restock, and other relevant metrics.
success_criteria: Stock-out reports are generated regularly and accurately

subprocess_flow.description: The inventory manager analyzes the stock-out reports to identify trends, patterns, and recurring root causes. This may involve statistical analysis, data visualization, and comparison to historical data.
success_criteria: Stock-out trends and patterns are identified and documented

subprocess_flow.description: The AI-powered predictive analysis system is continuously refined and improved based on the latest stock-out data and analysis, enhancing its ability to predict future stock-out risks.
success_criteria: AI prediction accuracy improves over time

subprocess_flow.description: Based on the stock-out analysis and AI recommendations, the inventory manager implements preventative measures to minimize future stock-outs. This may include adjusting safety stock levels, improving demand forecasting accuracy, diversifying suppliers, or optimizing inventory replenishment strategies.
The inventory manager monitors the effectiveness of the implemented preventative measures by tracking key metrics, such as stock-out frequency, lost sales, and customer satisfaction.
success_criteria: Effectiveness of preventative measures is continuously monitored

subprocess_flow.description: The inventory manager adjusts inventory management strategies and preventative measures as needed based on the monitored metrics, ensuring continuous improvement in stock-out prevention and customer satisfaction.
success_criteria: Inventory management strategies are continuously adjusted to optimize performance
